original_title: Escuela de Nada Salva la Navidad
overview: The first sketch show by Escuela de Nada. A christmas movie produced by EDN in which you'll see how they try to save christmas after having lived a truly shitty year.
tagline: Christmas is in danger and only you along with Leo, Chris and Nacho can save it.
title: Escuela de Nada Salva la Navidad
